titles.title: Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
To reauthorize the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area.
Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act - Amends the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Act of 2000 to extend through FY2030 the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to make grants or provide assistance for the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area.
